scripts.dep: docker-compose run workspace composer update --ignore-platform-reqs && composer install --ignore-platform-reqs && npm install
scripts.cache: docker-compose run workspace php artisan config:clear
scripts.migrate: docker-compose run workspace php artisan migrate:fresh --seed
scripts.passport: docker-compose run workspace php artisan passport:install
scripts.larkey: docker-compose run workspace composer run-script post-create-project-cmd
scripts.idehelper: docker-compose run workspace php artisan ide-helper:generate && docker-compose run workspace php artisan ide-helper:models -W && docker-compose run workspace php artisan ide-helper:meta
